name: @solgenomics/cxgn_js
description: node package containing all importable CXGN/SGN JavaScript files.

scripts.reset: export npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm/cache; npm config set engine-strict true; rm -r build/ || true && npm install .
scripts.build: export npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm/cache; npm run reset && webpack --config build.webpack.config.js
scripts.build-watch: export npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm/cache; npm run reset && webpack --config build.webpack.config.js -w
scripts.reset-test: export npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm/cache; npm config set engine-strict true; rm -r build_test/ || true && npm install .
scripts.build-test: export npm_config_cache=/tmp/npm/cache; npm run reset-test && webpack --config test.webpack.config.js
